name: Raikou

attacks.name: Discharge
attacks.effect: Roll a d6. Roll that many d12s. Unless that Pokemon is Lightning type or has 2 Lightning Energies attached, put d4 damage counters (roll individually) on the Pokemon in each corresponding spot. If there is no Pokemon there, reroll.

flavor: Power plants and power lines attract these Pokemon. Once considered a legendary dog, they're now just seen as pests.
